short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to modify the user interface of TARUMT Intranet to make it look more modern and pleasing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an open source project, you may find the source code at https://github.com/AlstonChan/TARUMT-Intranet-Beautifier
